page.title: 01YATE
page.content: Yate is designated as a New Town, until the 1960's the land was used for agriculture purposes. Two major industries were situated alongside the main road. Parnalls which is now Jacksons and Newman Industries. Newmans factory is in the process of being demolished so that the site may be redeveloped. The industrial develpoment in Yate has increased with the provision of an Industrial Estate, mainly for light industry. Housing continues to grow with local opposition because facilities are not able to cope wtih the growing demands eg The Health Centre. Yate New Town is the largest housing development in Europe.
